title: Bg. 18.24
sanskrit: यत्तु कामेप्सुना कर्म साहङ्कारेण वा पुन: ।क्रियते बहुलायासं तद्राजसमुदाहृतम् ॥ २४ ॥
transliteration: yat tu kāmepsunā karmasāhaṅkāreṇa vā punaḥkriyate bahulāyāsaṁtad rājasam udāhṛtam

words_trans.k\u0101ma-\u012bpsun\u0101: by one with desires for fruitive results

literary_trans: But action performed with great effort by one seeking to gratify his desires, and enacted from a sense of false ego, is called action in the mode of passion.But action performed with great effort by one seeking to gratify his desires, and enacted from a sense of false ego, is called action in the mode of passion.
